title: Chris Bryant – 2022 Comments on Matt Hancock Going on I’m a Celebrity
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Bryant, the Labour MP for Rhondda, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content: There is something deeply unpleasant about the former health secretary playing around in the jungle when his constituents are facing a cost of living crisis and long covid sufferers are looking for answers from the inquiry.
